data.description: enable to communicate with Xpriori XMS
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Xpriori XMS is a XMLDBMS. cf. http://www.xpriori.com/p_xms.html

    I can't found any modules to communicate with this DBMS in CPAN.

    PS. I have changed "XprioriXMS" to "Xpriori::XMS".
